verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's administration [V: has] repeatedly denied that its policy is to separate children from their parents when families cross the US border illegally , but its own internal documents contradict that .

President Donald Trump 's administration has repeatedly denied that its policy is to [V: separate] [ARG1: children] [ARG2: from their parents] [ARGM-TMP: when families cross the US border illegally] , but its own internal documents contradict that .

President Donald Trump 's administration has repeatedly denied that its policy is to separate children from their parents [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: families] [V: cross] [ARG1: the US border] [ARGM-MNR: illegally] , but its own internal documents contradict that .

President Donald Trump 's administration has repeatedly denied that its policy is to separate children from their parents when families cross the US border illegally , but [ARG0: its own internal documents] [V: contradict] [ARG1: that] .
